content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving to go over to my girlfriends house around 9:30 pm when i got out to my truck i noticed a meteor flying threw the sky, i said " cool" to myself as i drove over to her house i noticed 2 more, i was in shock as it had been a long time since i seen one but now 3 on the short drive, the sky was crystal clear every star so bright! 

i arrived at her place and went into the house i told her what i just seen and said i was going back outside to see if i can see more. when i went outside her upstairs neighbour was outside having a cigaret and i had told him about the meteors! he said he had also seen a couple as we'll, we then noticed 4 blinking fast moving objects circling around the canada / usa boarder , we just figured that they may have been just the so called drones that fly over for boarder security as we live right on the boarder of buffalo ny.

with both of us looking in the sky i seen 3 big white lights coming from the ne at an amazing speed , at first i thought maybe the were fighter jets in formation but not a sound was being made! i said to the neighbour look at this , he said i see it " when it got closer to us i noticed that this was one solid object and absolutely massive in size! to describe how low it was , the buffalo airport is about 20 km away you can see planes descending all the time into buffalo , what ever this was managed to fly under a plane landing at the time in buffalo , as it went past the boarder it went into what looked like a cloaked sort of state, where it dimmed right down but the 3 white lights where still visible it was moving at a rate i had never seen before faster then any plane before i knew it the object was heading sw and was gone with us just standing there blown away on what we just seen!
content.summary: Massive sized triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Good morning, yesterday i caught a photo of etna erupting, you see an object right in the crater where the smoke comes out is something of a black tip, as if an object is monitoring very closely and half or maybe more, and inside the crater , to exclude birds or insects. 
greetings 
  [name removed/cms/tg]

google translate

webcan etna: http://www.Guide-etna.Com/webcam/
content.summary: Good morning, yesterday i caught a photo of etna erupting,

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba yo tomando unas 1906 en un bar de la zona, cuando vi un objeto raro en una ventana de un edificio aleatorio.

despues de estar varios minutos observando, me di cuenta de que no era una persona, era una especie de ogro peludo con un trombón en la mano.
a su lado estaba una especie de botella de cacique o votante del pp.

de súpeto, salieron volando y una nave espacial vino a recojerlos.

hacendado me hayo.
content.summary: Estaba yo tomando unas 1906 en un bar de la zona...

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were driving home to laramie, wyoming after dropping my friend off at the denver airport. when we were approaching laramie on the outskirts of town a large orb shape about the same size as the moon appears in the sky shot through the clouds and disappeared over the horizon. this all happened in about 2-3 seconds, almost instantly, the object had to be moving at an insane speed. the object was round, and a bright white with a very light bluish tail. i just wanted to make this post incase anyone else had seen the same thing, it was unlike anything i've ever seen before.
content.summary: Massive orb flew through clouds at amazing speeds above laramie, wy.

content.detailedDescription:
1. this is a hard form to fill out  because this is not just a single event, and i also think i may be experiencing abduction with my boyfriend. i'm filling this out to maybe get help with my current situation dealing with ufo's and aliens. the first time i ever encountered a ufo i was sitting in my room watching hulu or netflix and just looking out my window. every other time i was out on a night walk (with my boyfriend and sometimes my dog would come with us, i don't go alone) or i happen to just look out my window and see it.
2. i live in an area where there are quite a few hills/mountains, there is a visible cell tower right out front of my house on a large mountian. next to it there would appear to be a white flashing light on the mountian, i assumed  is was a  car driving up the mountian but i google maped it and there's no road to get up to it, it can only be accessed by a flying vehicle. the the light would quickly move upwards, then go left or right, then flash a green/ teal color and dissipate out of thin air and hover above my neighborhood or over a small airport i live next to. it does this nearly every night, and every night it seems to get closer and closer to my home.
3. at first i thought it was a car, but then i immediately knew it was a ufo once i saw the way it moved and the colors it would turn.
4. it seems to be a round object like a sideways oval with a round like shape on top. it has a total of five lights on it, 3 in the front, and two on the sides that flash. from a distance ( such as on the mountian i live in front of) the three lights on the front and the two on the sides mesh together and look like one big bright light. when it is close(such as hovering over my neighbors house) the lights on the front look red/orange/yellow, i've seen the ufo multiple times and the colors aren't always the same. also the two flashing lights turn off unless it's further away from my home/neighborhood (such as being over the small airport i live next to)
the light tends to move upwards off the mountian and move to the left or right then dissipate and i also see it dissipate instantaneously and appear in a different location. it will also hover in the same spot for several minutes or even hours then turn green and flash into a different area and the cycle will repeat over and over again all night. 
5. at first i was shocked because i never thought something like this would ever happen to me but now i'm completely used to it. what i'm not used to is aliens visiting my home. i've taken videos and photos of the object several times. 
6. i don't ever lose sight of it unless i go to sleep, i never see it during the day, otherwise it can look out my window at any time of night and it will be somewhere in my area visible from my home.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo hovers over my area  every night for the past two months over the neighbors house and mine. i've also been visited by  extra terrestrial beings.

content.detailedDescription: I was using an iss app on my smart phone to watch an iridium flare that would occur at about 9:10 pm. i was in my front yard looking in the general direction of where the iridium flare was to take place. i thought i was seeing things when i saw what appeared to be a star that was brighter than most stars, much like a planet.  i thought i saw the star move several times.  the iridium flare occurred right on time.  i went in the house, told my wife that i thought i saw a ufo.  we both went out in the back yard and began to watch the object.  shortly after we began to watch the object it moved in abrupt right, left movements and several times it moved in a small circle. it defied what i consider the laws of physics. my wife then saw another object to the left of the bright object. the object was not as bright,however, it was also moving like the first object. we watched the two objects for about 50 minutes. i tried to view the brightest object through binoculars, it was difficult to focus, however, there was a bluish tinge to the whiteness of the object.  i tried to take a video with my point and shoot camera, on a tripod, however, there was not enough light emission from the object to take the video. the brightness of the primary object is much like the intensity of the iss as it passes overhead.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Star like appearance slightly blue tinge.  much like a bright led

content.detailedDescription: We were outside in our pool, and there was a moderate amount of flight traffic from o'hare airport which is approximately ten miles away. we were watching some of the planes and then noticed what was flying like a plane, about the same speed and size, but the light it gave off was very different. it did not look like the white landing lights and green and red clearance lights of an airplane, but instead looked like something that was on fire. as the object came from the northeast toward the north, the light grew dimmer. when it was due north of us it disappeared. approximately a minute later another object appeared which looked almost exactly the same in every way. it took the same path and grew dim at the same point as the previous object. they left no trail and made no sound. they flickered like something that was burning. the objects were probably a couple miles away.
content.summary: These objects had the same flight path as an airplane, roughly the same speed, altitude, size etc, but appeared more like a ball of flame rather than the lights of an aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: My boy friend spotted what seems like a shooting star. then i saw it myself and so did his mother,, it was moving extremely fast but then got brighter as if like a shooting star would when it hits the atmosphere. after that it damn in brighton and continued on this extremely fast is exact pattern then it continued north intel it got so damn that it could not be seen again was definitely not a shooting star or anything of this planet.
content.summary: Zig zag pattern. brighten at times then dimmed. unearthly speed

content.detailedDescription: I left work at around 8:15 pm and headed north onto highway 69 in overland park kansas when i noticed a bright light to the north. it was like a very bright star or planet but it was still light out. there were no clouds at the time. i wondered if what i was looking at was a star or a plane but never saw any blinking lights. then about two minutes later it just vanished. it didn't zoom of anywhere it just disappeared completely in an instant.
content.summary: Very bright light. like a very bright star or planet but it was still light outside.

content.detailedDescription: We live on a mountain, and were having a thunderstorm.  i went out to have my tea on the front landing, and to the west the black clouds had cleared leaving a band of clear sky over the opposite mountains as the storm moved eastward. the sun was setting in the west, and it made a very beautiful sky in that section. i noticed an object which directionally was heading straight upward from a south east heading, leaving a beautiful gold trail sparkling larger when it cleared the mountain and narrowing toward the underside of the craft.I immediately focused on it, as it stopped and then proceeded to hover for about 3 or 4 minutes. i went in to the house to get my binoculars and returned but was still unable to see it clearly. i then thought of the video cam, and went in and got that. i tried to zoom several times but only made it blurry. the craft began to move slowly in a west north west direction, until it became hard to see a few minutes later. when i had gone in to get my camera, i told my wife and son in law and they both came out and witnessed it also. this is the first sighting of this kind i have had since i moved here 15 years ago. the really strange part of this is that when i reviewed the video on my tv and not the camera, i clearly saw a smaller white craft moving at tremendous speed from my side of the mountain range and went up and over the mountain toward the vacating craft.  at this point, i knew that this was some sort of a ufo, and clarified it in my mind. i could supply some sort of copy for your perusal if interested.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed bright light with trail go up vertically, then stop. bright gold trail behind, then hover 4 minutes, then head off to nw slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I can't remember the date of the citing because i tried not to think about after that night.  everyone made fun of what we saw.  

a friend and i lived in antioch, ca but had been shopping in concord, ca and were heading home.  we were in my 1966 ford mustang driving beside the town park.  it was somewhere between 7-8 pm.  it was dusky dark but i had my lights on and there was a fine misting soft rain falling.  suddenly it stopped raining and we could reflecting lights on the road and the hood of my car.  i slowed down, we could not see the outer edges of the body of the object because of the trees lining the streets around us.  we heard no sound (not even animals or night sounds) as we watched the vessel above us.  it did not move for some time.  i can't tell you how much time passed but my friend and i discussed what it could be and why there was no sound.  eventually it left in such a way that astounded us.  one second it was there and another it was gone.  no change in anything except it started misting rain again.  we knew we had witnessed something strange but had no idea what it was.  i didn't believe in ufos, aliens from outer space or any such things but i still can not explain what we did see.  

the following morning i called the police in concord to find out if any one else had witnessed what we had.  the officer told me that he had over 150 calls regarding the same thing we had seen.  even police officers called in and told what they had seen.  the following day the newspaper reported people seeing the round object with the lights but vandenberg afb had reported that they were testing a new aircraft.  but after 56 years they have never revealed anything like what i saw.  i know at least 150 other people saw what we saw and there was an item in the local newspaper. i never believed the aircraft testing report but i don't know what i did see.
content.summary: It was circular with opposite rotating blue and green lights, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello dear mufon people,

we made these pictures while at the eiffel tower but did not see or hear anything
shortly after taking the last picture we took one of the elevator's down which got stuck between floors for abt 10 min.
 later back at the hotel we noticed the lights on the pictures 

i cropped some pictures and have also used different programs to make the picture lighter so i could see what it was better
also used some of these painting programs to see what it looked like with different effects.. i included what i could upload 

hope these are helpful to your cause

greetings, a believer
content.summary: Possible ufo paris eijffeltower actualy did not see or hear anything discoverd it back at the hotel

content.detailedDescription:
I was enlightened about life and the galaxies, and met a beautiful star traveler that changed my life forever. the samarians are our forefathers
and they did make us through crossbreeding with the native peoples and cloning in laboratories . we were bred for greatness .,love life, art, music, masonry ,mathematics, astronomy ,self defense building fine metals 
fabrication, and star travel 19.5 degrees and the tetrahedral technology
and the rights of samarian passage is the only thing keeping us from super greatness
content.summary: Was tranfixed on orions belt and been studying the 19.5 degree mathematics and martian landscape .At the same time i faced a large black panther in my dreams and was not scared. we are all connected to everything and love the planet and each other

content.detailedDescription:
On june 8,2014 at about 3am, subject saw a star moving and cross another star.
subject video taped the lights on his phone and was startled to see a mother ship,grey in color,release three other "pods" one was red and went toward the east and the other two were green and went toward the north west. the grey mother ship headed north and disappeared. subject says witnesses  had video of  earlier similar objects from january.
content.summary: Late at night subject saw a star cross another star and circle it

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the freeway 60 eastbound towards riverside from los angeles, i was looking at the moon and also the airplanes on the sky and i started to see a light that wasn't blinking like the other airplanes, at this time i was near ontario airport, and i kept looking at the light and all of the sudden the light was moving slowly in one direction and it started going super fast like warpspeed and it disappeared.
content.summary: Ufo went into warpspeed and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was taking super moon pics aug. 11th on the east side of brownsburg. i thought i saw a shooting star at one point while taking the moon pictures. on the way home, i was watching the sky to the west. i was only about 3 blocks from my house, looking west when i noticed a red orb, or fireball. i have seen these before. i knew right away what it was. got home, had my camera in the car, so got it out right away. adjusted the settings, got one picture of it, as by that time was already over my house headed east. it was headed just to the right of the full moon. the moons light was so bright, that the orb just faded out in the light. i thought, oh darn, wanted to get more pics. i wanted it to come back. i took a couple more pics of the moon. it seemed like only 5 min. and i looked straight up, and another one was there. i got six or seven pictures of that one. it went on the same path, and faded out in the moons light, just as the other one did.  i thought it was no chinese lantern, as there was not much wind. moved too fast for a lantern, and what's the chance it was on the exact same flight pattern as the first. too slow for a plane, and no blinking lights. i could have sworn i only waited about 5 min. when the second one went over. but when i went to up-load my photos, the time said the first one was at 9:44, and the rest of the pics on the second one was 10:10.
content.summary: Just got done taking super moon pics, noticed red fireball in the west on the way home.

content.detailedDescription: Massachusetts. i have been abducted all my life.... in several states and in various ways.
content.summary: This form does not fit my experiences. my whole lifetime has been in contact with ets.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday june 8th at about 9pm, subject saw out his kitchen window what he describes as the most beautiful lights he has ever seen. the craft was hovering just above the tree line about one fourth a mile away.  it was hugh as large as a football field.  the craft was disc shaped and had two rotating bands of lights one band was moving clockwise and one band was moving counter clockwise. it had red, yellow, blue and white lights on the rotating bands. it had a hump on the top and bottom.  subject watched it for three minutes and them it just disappeared 
subject woke up later and felt sick like he was waking up from anesthesia, nauseated and dizzy. subject was missing two teeth and his jaw hurt. one of the teeth was gold. subject later realized he was missing time. subject has not yet gone to the doctor and says now the rest of his teeth are starting to disintegrate 
subject has a military background and concerned about using his real name.
subject has worked on military bases, and is concerned about repercussions
content.summary: Looked out windowand saw   the most beautiful lights above the tree line

content.detailedDescription: Standing out in my backyard waiting for the dogs to have their last potty break before bedtime, looking northwest. something catches my eye and i look up, thinking it might be a shooting star. it is not. it is not moving through the sky, but it is not still. it looks to be cone- or triangular-shaped and there are colored lights flashing around the bottom of it. the upper part just appears to be flashing bright then dim. i watched it for a few minutes, trying to determine if it was a case of double vision, but it was not. it was not moving like an aircraft of any kind, and did not look like the death throes of some light-years-distant star due to the colored lights at the bottom. i watched for several minutes. did not go in and get my camera or phone as i was pretty sure with the distance and being dark, it would not show up. this is not the first time i have seen something similar in this same general direction. i finally just went in and went to bed.
content.summary: Cone-shaped object in nw night sky with colored lights around bottom, white lights flashing on top.

content.detailedDescription:
We have seen over 10 occurrences of these objects in the last 3 months in the ottawa area. the objects speed along like satellites but then "pulse" brightly and on many occasions, change direction like a ball bouncing off a wall. there is no curve to the direction change at all and no speed loss. sometime they appear to be moving in a general direction and other times there is a random pattern to their movement. in all cases, there is no evidence of them coming into view and no evidence of them leaving. they appear, move around while they pulse, then dispensary. there have been numerous other people who have seen these things with me including my gf and about 5 of our friends at different times.
these things are very fast at most times although they appear to be able to hover as well. on one occasion, this being the last time we saw these things (aug, 2014), i was actually able to see the object between two pulses. it moved in a southerly direction and it curved to the southwest before pulsing one last time and disappearing. normally, the objects can not be seen between pulses.
they can not be stars, satellites or any other man made object that i know of. the speed is far too great and the turns are impossibly too abrupt.
i am a veteran and i am a plane enthusiast. i am quite sure of what i (we) saw and that i have not misidentified terrestrial objects.
content.summary: Looked like a satalite until it started to change direction like a ball bouncing off a wall

content.detailedDescription: i had just come home from the corner store and was getting out of my car. i happened to look to the north, towards the mountains and saw a bunch of lights in a paralle formation, following the mountains..I thought it was helicopters, but they didn't act like helicoptrs. no sound, too uniform, etc.., so i called my mom out and said look at this... i told her to get in the car, and we followed and watched these lights for awhile.Not a long while, i just wanted her to see them. we disregarded them , and it wasn't until i heard about the "phoenix lights", that i realized i have seen them myself, in 1994. i tucson,az!!! they were headed north. i don't know what to think, except i saw them in '94, in tucson.???? i was not scared or anything, just hoped it wasn't from the airbase. i don't think it was any flares at all... but it wasn't just in phoenix. and my mom had cancer and i wanted her to see them, and know we are not alone... ya know what i mean? im glad she saw them.
content.summary: Lights over tucson, az.

content.detailedDescription: I was on holiday in scotland in may 2013, i was taking a couple of pics from our hotel to show my daughter the view from the hotel, when i got home and was downloading pics to my computer, i noticed the unusual glowing light like marks in the pics, these two pictures were taken consecutively, and i swear i did not add the lights.
content.summary: I did not see the objects at time of taking pics

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen this same ufo multiple time hovering high in the sky's above the seattle/king county area.

i have seen it in the same location over a number of months.

i am a farmer and am up outside around 2am taking care of things.


at first i thought if was a star, so i watched it for a while and noticed it did not move, remained stationary, with lights flashing/blinking.

i have seen this same ufo multiple times, sometimes in the nw of my home, other times ne.

i was very curious the last time i saw it so i got out my 30 x 50 power binoculars, it was hard to steady them but when i focused and zoomed in i could see the different lights flashing.

it was very alarming. the object did not move.

i got tired of holding my binoculars and went into house.
i am going to see if the ufo comes back when the sky clears.

i am sure if will see it again.
the ufo is not in a flight path for sea-tac airport.
i will try and get a higher powered telescope when i see it next time.
content.summary: Clear night, saw pulsating red, blue, yellow,green lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a delta flight(dl16)out of sydney to los angeles. the plane took off around 11.30am on the morning of august 10th 2014 and we were about one and a half hours in to the flight and it was just before lunch service came around over the south pacific ocean at about 28,500 feet and about 580 mph.
i was in the aisle seat and asked the lady who was in the window seat to take the video on my phone for me out of the window because it looked so peaceful out the window.I didn't notice anything until i showed the video to a freind at work on monday night and he said what was that and watch it again and then i saw it and felt excited. went home and put the video on my computer and got a more detail and larger look of the object.
as soon as i saw it i thought it was a probe like the one's that i have seen buzzing around a british airways concorde and 747.
it was a faint white ball of light which got brighter that can be seen coming from the left of the plane in the same direction the plane was flying and then did a 90 degress turn and then went under the plane in the video. i know the windows in the plane are double paned and the sun was high in the sky and there were reflections caused by the sun and the windows but this ball of light seems to be moving very fast and in the video i see other anomalies but they could be refections from the sun and window but the white ball of light gives me the chills in a good way.
the white light went under the plane and the plane landed in los angeles safely.
content.summary: A ball of white light that turn at 90 degress

content.detailedDescription:
A friend had stayed the night with me when we were about 13. we thought it'd be fun to see if we could sneak out- just to go on a late night walk. we lived closed to fannin regional hospital and took a back road that ended within 5 mi of it, on hwy 5. it's been so long ago- i'm guessing it was between 12-1am. we both looked up around the same time, no reason to- just did. and we saw a stream of bright lights in the form of a triangle. we were both saying "what's that?".... and suddenly the lights (still as a triangle) begin zooming erratically through the sky. it was nothing we had ever seen before- no way possible was it a human aircraft. then we noticed a few single bright lights nearby. we were panicked so we both just ran. as far as i know, nothing (like an abduction) happened to us. i remember it clearly even today and my heart races as i type this. 
the reason i'm just getting this out now is i've been having odd events happening to me the past year... hearing bell like noises in my mind (as i was in band i'm familiar with instruments and this sound is unlike any human noise i've hear) as well as the waking up at 12:12, 1:11, 2:22, 3:33 & 4:44 phenomena happening. i don't know if this is a spiritual awakening or something else happening to me. after researching the internet- i'm seeing millions are having this happen as we'll- so i'm not alone. i don't know if this ties into the sighting- but i thought if mention it as well. 
years later i noticed in canton, ga another similar sighting. but it was only a few brief seconds and as hard as i try- i can't remember details. odd as it was at least 10 years later (apx 23 yrs old now) & yet i have the sighting at 13 burned into my mind. 
i'm sorry i have no pictures or proof to offer. i'd be happy to contact my childhood friend who could corroborate my story.
content.summary: Triangle shaped aircraft zipping erratically around night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sat at home watching tv. it was the time all aircraft was grounded because of the volcanic ash. i couldnt believe how bright this thing was and how fast it travelled. i said to my daughter did she see it but she had not. the thing i couldnt understand was why anything was flying when it shouldn't be. i know what i saw but its taken me all this time to tell someone because i know how people react to ufos .
content.summary: All planes had been grounded due to volcanic ash. this object i thought was strange because nothing should be in our airspace

content.detailedDescription: @ memorial day, 1980, my girlfriend and i were returning home to topeka, ks @ visiting our parents in salina, ks.  we were traveling east on i-70.  we had just passed the army airfield on the east side of junction city, ks.  it was a cloudless night @ 8:30 to 9 o'clock.  @ the airfield (on the highway) there begins a series of high hills and deep valleys.  my gf and i were talking @ how bright the stars in the sky were and i said how difficult it was to differentiate between them and planes to which she said she could always tell the difference.  so i put her to the test and started pointing out different points of light and asking her which was which and she got all of them right. i was amazed.  and then i pointed out another "star" and she hesitated.  when i asked her "what, you don't know?" she replied "it's gone." i then looked again and couldn't find what i had pointed out to her however, i was driving and had to pay attention to the road also for there was a lot of traffic. soon @ that however my gf got very quiet and slid down in her seat and clutched herself as if she were cold (even though it was a warm night).  when i asked her what was wrong she said, "i don't know what that is" pointing to the sky.  when i looked (bewildered at what she was talking @) i could see nothing and then (@ a short while) i got it.  there was a large space where we could see no stars, nothing but a blank space where stars should have been.  so i pulled on to the shoulder and stopped to get a better look.  {when i stopped we were on the 2nd or 3rd hill past the army airfield}  i got out of the car and told my gf to come out and see this but she refused acting very scared at the thought of doing so.  and so i alone watched this "blackness" coming toward us.  as this "blackness" approached me: almost directly up the highway: (you understand the highway was very bright w/headlights going both ways w/people returning home @ a holiday)and as it got closer i perceived it to be shaped like a blimp but it was moving sideways, not like a blimp at all.  i watched this "blackness move over the top of me and noticed that it had 2 small lights, one red and one green at either "end".  by extrapolating where the lights were in relation to me and how high the "mass" was above me i guessed that it was @ 500 feet long.  @ passing me it continued to follow the highway until it got to almost to the hill below which would have been the airfield and then  it turned to the sw and soon disappeared having never seemed to be in a hurry, just kind of floating.        however, the most interesting thing @ this encounter happened just after the "mass" passed over me.  i watched it the whole way but as it was just past me i observed (at what i thought was about 2/3 of the way up on the east facing side what i can only describe as a "window", a bit longer at the bottom than at the top and thus sloping upwards as one would imagine a window to look in the upper portion of a "blimp"shape. and it seemed to be back lighted for in that "window", was a shape;  as if a person was trying to cup their eyes to see out from a lighted space into the darkness beyond.  i know how i do that and the configuration of this shape was the same; torso and head in the middle, arms out to the sides in a semi-triangular shape cupping the eyes.  just like a child defying parents and doing a "forbidden" thing.  i thought @ the time; wow, they have the same probs w/children as we have.  but from now; ain't it a hoot.  p.S. degrees above the horizon?  how @ a couple hundred feet above my head. which says nothing @ the horizon. so why can i not get out of here w/out answering a question which has nothing to do w/my sighting? redo your q&a
content.summary: Object was only visible by the absence of stars as it passed above me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in thornes park, wakefield walking home from a friends house. i was looking to see if i could see the perseid meteor shower when i saw a strange light in the east. i first thought it was a plane but the object made a turn to the north and i saw another light behind it. the lights then turned to the south and made this pattern as they flew closer to my location. as they flew over my i saw that they were large in size (about three football pitches) each. 
the bottom of each craft had pulsating lights of various colours (red, blue yellow). the crafts continued in a zigzag (north to south) as they flew westwards.
i felt uneasy when i saw the size of the crafts as i knew they couldn't be man made.
i lost sight of the crafts when they flew over the horizon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 large object objects moved in a zig zag like path from the east to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
On 14/15 april 2014 i was taking pictures of the blood moon from my back yard looking south towards las vegas with my nikon cool pix 520 digital camera with my son, his friend and my wife present and we did not see anything unusual. about a week later i downloaded the pictures and in the upper right corner of one of the pictures i find what appears to be a triangle vehicle. i don't have an explanation for it as we did not see it fly by. 


if someone has an answer to what the object is i would like to know with a quick e-mail, thanks...
content.summary: After taking picures of blood moon found 1 picture with what appears to be a tringle vehicle on upper right of picture

content.detailedDescription: I arrived home from work at about 11:39pm on tuesday night, august 12th. i parked my car in the garage, then did a couple of other things, and paused in the driveway, looking at the sky, to see if i could observe any of the perseid meteor shower. i saw stars and the moon, then, as i was looking  west, i saw what appeared to be a ripple in the starlit sky, it was not directly above me, it was somewhat in front of me, to the west. i could make out just the front of a short snub nose with wings out to the sides. i couldn't perceive any other part of the craft, but the very front, because that is where the stars appeared to ripple along a dark, shadowy line. the rest of it looked like the normal, starry sky. i didn't hear anything. i watched it for about 20-30 seconds and it appeared to be moving slowly, blimp-like. then, it either disappeared, or became completely invisible to me. i could not tell how large it was, or how far away, as it was barely perceptible.
content.summary: I saw a shadow, it was an outline of the front of a craft with the stars rippling in front as it moved and either disappeared, or became invisible.
